mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.full_name as author_name FROM t_forum_comment c INNER JOIN t_user u ON c.author_id = u.user_id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} AND c.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM t_forum_comment WHERE parent_comment_id = #{parentCommentId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM t_forum_comment WHERE author_id = #{authorId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_forum_comment (post_id, author_id, parent_comment_id, content, is_deleted) VALUES (#{postId}, #{authorId}, #{parentCommentId}, #{content}, #{isDeleted})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_forum_comment SET is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
